privacyPolicy.p: This Privacy Policy explains how information is collected, used, and protected when you visit and use this website (the "Site"). This Site is a fan-made, non-commercial project created for educational purposes.

content.title: 1. Purpose of This Website
content.description: This website was created as part of a learning project using React and is intended for fans of the Harry Potter universe. The Site is not intended to generate profit, sell products, or provide paid services.

content.title: 2. Information We Collect
content.description: 2.1 Personal Information: We do not intentionally collect or request personal information, such as: Full name, Email address, Phone number, Physical address, Payment or billing information. Users can browse the Site without providing any personal data. 2.2 Automatically Collected Information: When you access the Site, some technical information may be collected automatically, including: IP address (in anonymized or aggregated form), Browser type and version, Operating system, Device type, Pages visited and time spent on those pages, Referring website (if applicable). This information is collected for statistical and educational purposes only, to better understand how users interact with the Site.

content.title: 3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content.description: The Site may use cookies or similar technologies to: Ensure basic functionality, Improve performance and user experience, Analyze traffic and usage patterns. Cookies do not contain personally identifiable information. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings, though some parts of the Site may not function properly.

content.title: 4. Use of Information
content.description: The information collected is used solely to: Maintain and improve the Site, Monitor performance and detect technical issues, Analyze usage trends for learning purposes. We do not sell, rent, or trade any information to third parties.
